review: Had to return Firestick.  Only Internet service we are able to get at our house is by dish service therefore it was not compatible.  When we tried to watch something it kept stopping and buffering about every 3 to 4 minutes.  Not very conducive to enjoying movie.  Weird thing is, I can watch a movie on my computer without it doing this.  I use the same Internet service for my computer.  Go figure!  My daughter has one and is on a cable internet service where it ces into her house via an actual cable and it works fine and she loves it.
